pullRequest.title: Move notification settings to their own screen
pullRequest.bodyText:
Move notification settings to their own screen #4474
1.added a new fragment named "notification manager"
2.replaced all settings related into this fragment
3.Added this fragment under setting search bar
Closes #4474

commit.message:
commit 1
added a new fragment named "notification manager"
replaced all settings related into this fragment

nodes.bodyText: Please rename the xml file to preferences_notifications (plural). I think that reads a bit better. The Java class name is fine as-is

Please use plural here and move the setting above the statistics screen. Also, having an icon would be great :) I think the bell icon that is already shipped with Android Studio would work (new->Vector asset).
Please delete instead of commenting. The setting is no longer used in the old location, so the code does not have to be kept either.
I would rather call this simply "Notifications" (not manager).

nodes.bodyText:
I think some of the titles can be simplified, now that it is its own screen. Instead of
== Notifications ==
Show download report
Show auto download report
Show notifications on sync errors

I would suggest something like
== Notifications ==
Automatic download completed
Download errors
Synchronization errors

@keunes thoughts?
